healer apprentice general: The herbs in the Dark Forest look nothing like the ones of c_nClan, and you don't think you've ever seen a flower here.
Muck drips from your tangled fur as you attempt to water the buds. You know they'll never bloom, but they bring you fragile hope of a brighter future.
No matter how many wads of cobwebs you press against a Dark Forest warrior's wound, they continue to gush blackened blood as their spirit fades in and out.
Every 'herb' you find seems to be poisonous, their thorns dripping with blood and muck.
